item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>Welcome home -it's nice to have everyone back in the country! Looking forward to seeing everyone next weekend</p>
item.content:encoded: Welcome home -it’s nice to have everyone back in the country! Looking forward to seeing everyone next weekend

item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: <p>Hi Matthew - welcome back! I'm pleased that the final leg of your journey went well - I should think it feels strange to be back in the house - they always feel so empty for the first few hours. FI and I are looking forward to seeing you and the family the weekend after next. Sleep well tonight!</p>
item.content:encoded: Hi Matthew – welcome back! I’m pleased that the final leg of your journey went well – I should think it feels strange to be back in the house – they always feel so empty for the first few hours. FI and I are looking forward to seeing you and the family the weekend after next. Sleep well tonight!
